item.title: How to Never Miss Out on a Job Opening ðŸ¤–
item.description: TLDR: I explain how you can write an automated script that looks at job postings from companies and emails you the results. Have you ever been disappointed to know that you got rejected from a job because you applied too late? They already hired someone else! How many times have you missed out on job opportunities because you didnâ€™t know a company was hiring for that position? It might be the perfect job for you, but you just didnâ€™t know about it!
